content: basil dragon buddy pattern created by savage raid chest difficulty easy/intermediate it takes patience and persistence to conquer basil the sleepy dragon he lies in wait his wings draped upon him ready at any moment author s note this pattern is designed to be played with by all through many different adventures please do so tag @mrssavagepl9 on instagram because i truly enjoy friends and family coming together to enjoy time with one another and see you with your creations i am a stay at home mom who works very hard for many hours to bring you fun and kid-friendly patterns please do not sell this pattern please do make my patterns and sell the physical product with credit or give the physical product to friends and family lastly one giant thank you for making my pattern you are helping support my small business dream stitch breakdown ● st s -
